title: Sweet Magnolias Stars Share Their Hopes for Potential Season 5: ‘You Can Never Turn the Lights Off in Serenity’
description: Season 4 of Sweet Magnolias is still looming large in Netflix’s Top 10, but fans — and a certain TVLine editor who shall remain nameless (me) — are already eager to find out what’s next for the good people of Serenity. The feel-good drama hasn’t technically been renewed for Season 5, but given the show’s […]
author: Andy Swift

title: Charlie Cox: Daredevil Got ‘Upgrade’ With Move to Marvel Studios — Plus, What All Survived Born Again’s ‘Creative Overhaul’?
description: You’ll see that the Man Without Fear is the same, but different — the recipient of “a little upgrade,” Charlie Cox puts it — when Daredevil: Born Again finally debuts on Disney+. Officially greenlit more than two-and-a-half years ago, the “TV MA”-rated revival-of-sorts wound up subject to a “creative overhaul” when, during a pause in production due to […]
author: Matt Webb Mitovich
